name: Scythe 3
Lore: 'Heavily modified TIE/ln. Cannons upgraded to destroy small asteroids while serving in Anoat system. P-w702 maneuvering jets added by Death Star technicians.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot. Hebsly deploys -2 aboard. Once during each of your move phases, may fire one starship weapon aboard (''hit'' targes are lost). Immune to attrition < 4 when Hebsly piloting.',
